description.displayText: Hannah is the best. She was our nanny for 4 months, full time, and it was a dream. She nannied our then 2 year old and 5 month old. Our 5 month old was a very tough baby and she was so patient and stuck with every new sleeping program we threw her way with grace. It was also during COVID, so she was home with the girls while we were working from home in a small house. She made the situation absolutely comfortable for all parties and we loved having her there. She still babysits for us and feels like a part of our family!

description.displayText: Hannah is wonderful! She shows up on time, is fantastic with my 18 month old and so interactive. She always is doing crafts, going outside to play and fun adventures with him. I trust her to drive him to toddler times and my son is all smiles when we come home from work. We feel extremely lucky to have found her!
